snippet: The Interior Department plans to remove wolves from the endangered species list and transfer control to the states.
abstract: Editorial raises concerns about plans by the Interior Department's Fish and Wildlife Service to remove wolves from endangered list in all 48 contiguous states and transfer control of their fate to the states.
lead_paragraph: The Interior Department plans to remove wolves from the endangered species list and transfer control to the states.

headline.main: After Years of Progress, a Setback in Saving the Wolf
headline.print_headline: After Years of Progress, A Setback in Saving the Wolf
